changelog:
- Adds Peacock Mastery if you have mastery enabled (AnthonyFuller)
- Descriptions for starting locations (AnthonyFuller, Translations TBD)
- Can scan for target (Mumbai/Berlin style) after discovering their picture (AnthonyFuller, Can glitch if target goes out of sight during scan)
- Makes target follow closer during escort
- Amends Laptop Clue to point out target will be in a uniform (Translations TBD)- Removes back of train camera
- Enables basic blank minimap
- Turns back of train roof into non jumpable ledge rather than letting players 'walk off' edge
